nl.inl.blacklab.mocks

Class MockSpansInBuckets

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.mocks.MockSpansInBuckets
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpansInBuckets

    public class MockSpansInBuckets
extends Object
implements SpansInBuckets
    Stub SpansInBuckets class for testing. Takes arrays and iterates through 'hits' from these arrays.
